We are humbled to be invited to donate our entire music catalogue to the British Library Sound Archive.
It will be preserved as part of the nation's audio and cultural heritage.
We have been recognised as culturally significant. We are now part of UK music heritage. Forever.
Oh yeah and Sonic Sound Archive uploads will continue (as inconsistent) like normal now again
